infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Arkive needs access to your camera to let you take photos of documents for upload.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Arkive needs access to your photo library so you can select images to upload as documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Arkive needs permission to save documents or images to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Arkive uses notifications to remind you about document expirations and important updates.
